00025 #ifndef _BASE_TIME_
00026 #define _BASE_TIME_
00027 
00028 #include <base/base>
00029 #include <base/Object>
00030 
00031 namespace base {
00032 
00033 class Time : public Object
00034 {
00035 public:
00036   Time();
00037   Time(const Time& t) { secs=t.secs; micros=t.micros; }
00038   Time(long secs, long micros) { this->secs=secs; this->micros=micros; }
00039   Time(Real secs);
00040   virtual ~Time();
00041 
00042   virtual String className() const { return String("Time"); }
00043 
00044   bool isPast() const { return less(*this,now()); }
00045 
00046   Time& operator=(const Time& t) { secs=t.secs; micros=t.micros; return *this; }
00047   bool operator<(const Time& t) const { return less(*this,t); }
00048   bool operator>(const Time& t) const { return greater(*this,t); }
00049   bool operator==(const Time& t) const { return equal(*this,t); }
00050         Time& operator-=(const Time& t);
00051         Time& operator+=(const Time& t);
00052 
00053   Real seconds() const { return Real(secs) + Real(micros)/Real(microsPerSec); }
00054 
00055   static const long microsPerSec = 1000000;
00056   static const Time& now();
00057   static bool isPast(const Time& t) { return less(t,now()); }
00058 
00059   static void sleep(const Time& t);
00060   static void sleep(long secs, long micros);
00061   static void sleep(Real secs) { sleep(Time(secs)); }
00062 
00063   static long timeResolution() { return resolution; } // us
00064 
00065   long secs, micros;
00066 
00067 protected:
00068   static Time* time;
00069 
00070   static long baseSecs;
00071   static long baseMicros;
00072   static Time lastNow;
00073   static long resolution;
00074 
00075   static bool less(const Time& t1, const Time& t2);
00076   static bool greater(const Time& t1, const Time& t2);
00077   static bool equal(const Time& t1, const Time& t2) { return (t1.secs==t2.secs) && (t1.micros==t2.micros); }
00078   void normalize();
00079 
00080 };
00081 
00082 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, const Time& t); // Output
00083 
00084 inline Time operator-(const Time& t1, const Time& t2)
00085 { Time r(t1); r-=t2; return r; }
00086 
00087 inline Time operator+(const Time& t1, const Time& t2)
00088 { Time r(t1); r+=t2; return r; }
00089 
00090 } // base
00091 
00092 #endif
